features: PurgeAir™-equipped: Waterproof, air-purging valve helps the bag compress further once it’s been sealed.
Adaptable: Adjustable carry strap and multiple lash points make it easy to carry or anchor the bag.
Easy-view interior: Light-colored or semi-translucent interiors signifcantly ease identifcation of contents within.
BUILT FOR THE JOURNEY: Made of rugged, ?exible, and fullywaterproof materials designed to withstand frequent and demanding use.
WATERPROOF: Constructed with 100% waterproof materials and tight-sealing closures to deliver protection in waterlogged environments.
DURABLY CONSTRUCTED: Fully welded seams result in stronger and more durably waterproof construction compared to sewn-andtaped seams.
OVAL BOTTOM: Stable shape won’t easily roll around; it’s also easy to store,stack, and pack.
TIGHT, SIMPLE SEALING: Updated DrySeal™ roll-top closure makes it easier and more intuitive to achieve an optimal seal.
PVC-FREE: Materials have a reduced environmental impact over vinylcoated materials.
